I got it to work. For those of you having trouble with the host file don't worry about it. All you have to do (AFTER you install but BEFORE you actually run the program) is Disable the program's connection to the internet with WINDOWS FIREWALL. For Windows 7 users just go to control panel, windows firewall then click ADVANCED. Click Outbound Rules

Once ur there add a New Rule. From there you can add the photokey program and disable it's internet access. When ur done with that, run the program and add the key and ur done.

Windows XP users can go to control panel then windows firewall and hit the Exceptions tab. From there click Add Program and find the photokey program in ur program files folder. After u add it make sure the box next to it is UNCHECKED. That way it won't be able to connect to the internet. Hope this helps.
ALSO Possemaste you should have gave everyone the information that needs to be put into the host file. Just saying "edit the host file" isn't quite enough information.

Ok, it works..just follow instructions as per Taskmasta and then copy and paste program key into program file of fxhome in c>programfile>fxhome and when asked click download form file and browse to c>programfile>FXhome>programkey.

I got it to work!!...you have to edit the host file like he sais...there is instructions in the download...you have to open the passemaste file in notepad...here is the instructions he gives...

in c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc the host file add 127.0.0.1   fxhome.com
        When asked for activation, check "Select my downloaded key file"
                    and browse for PhotoKey3Pro.programKey


         Disallow internet connection for the program by your firewall
